oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-08-20 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 20, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Cowboy Copas (host/performer), guest performer Jim Wilson with his daughter June, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Moon Mullican, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Jim Wilson; Grandpa Jones; Cowboy Copas
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Cowboy Copas introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Jim Wilson -- The Farmer And The Lord (Jim Wilson) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Grandpa Jones -- Are You From Dixie (Grandpa Jones) -- Cowboy Copas talks -- Tragic Romance (Cowboy Copas) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Cowboy Copas) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Copas, Cowboy; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Mullican, Moon, 1909-1967; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Wilson, Jim (Musician)
